accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Labor Action Coalition Memorabilia #6092 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p:
Related Collections:
6092: Labor Action Coalition Records
6092 AV: Labor Action Coalition Audio-Visual Material

scopecontent.p: "A Woman's Place is in her Union" ; "I am for Kennedy '80" ; "Dump Nixon" ; "District 65 of the UAW, Cornell Chapter" ; "UAW" ; small pin with a profile on it ; "Don't Mourn: Organize" ; pin in shape of white bird ; pin in shape of a book with character writing on one side, a profile of a man on the other ; "March 28, March on Harrisburg, Keep TMI Shut Down" ; "Solidarity, I Support Service/Maintenance, Cornell Chapter, U.A.W." (2) ; "I Was There Solidarity Day, September 19, 1981, Machinists Union"
